mapper.insert: insert /*综合-价格-批量插入时效方案明细*/ into PKP.T_SRV_EXPRESS_EFF_PLAN_DETAIL ( ID, T_SRV_PRODUCT_ID, T_SRV_PRODUCT_CODE, T_SRV_EXPRESS_EFFECTIVE_PLAN_I, DEPT_REGION_ID, DEPT_REGION_CODE, ARRV_REGION_ID, ARRV_REGION_CODE, MAX_TIME, MAX_TIME_UNIT, MIN_TIME, MIN_TIME_UNIT, ARRIVE_TIME, ADD_DAY, DELIVERY_TIME, HAS_SALES_DEPT, LONG_OR_SHORT, DESCRIPTION, VERSION_NO, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_ORG_CODE, ACTIVE) SELECT sys_guid() , T_SRV_PRODUCT_ID, T_SRV_PRODUCT_CODE, #{newId}, DEPT_REGION_ID, DEPT_REGION_CODE, ARRV_REGION_ID, ARRV_REGION_CODE, MAX_TIME, MAX_TIME_UNIT, MIN_TIME, MIN_TIME_UNIT, ARRIVE_TIME, ADD_DAY, DELIVERY_TIME, HAS_SALES_DEPT, LONG_OR_SHORT, DESCRIPTION, VERSION_NO, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_ORG_CODE, #{active} FROM pkp.T_SRV_EXPRESS_EFF_PLAN_DETAIL EFFECTIVE_DETAIL WHERE EFFECTIVE_DETAIL.T_SRV_EXPRESS_EFFECTIVE_PLAN_I = #{oldId}
